attributes.action: Petition against flying Trump balloon in Parliament Square.
attributes.background: The London Mayor has allowed the balloon to be flown on President Trump's UK visit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Mayor of London is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
